newsitem.title: USA: McAfee Q3 shr rises to $0.24 vs $0.01.
newsitem.headline: McAfee Q3 shr rises to $0.24 vs $0.01.

text.p: NOTES: (A) No material acquisition related charges were recorded in Q3 1996.
(B) Excludes the write-off of $10,784,000 associated with the acquisition of Saber Software and two McAfee European distributors during Q3 1995.
With this charge, earnings before taxes for Q3 1995 were $1,648,000, net income was $430,000 and earnings per share were $0.01.
For the first nine months of 1995, earnings before taxes were $13,582,000, net income was $7,606,000, and earnings per share were $0.16.
(C) Excludes the write-off of $2,868,000 taken in the second quarter arising primarily from the write-off of in-process R&D associated with the acquisition of the Remote Desktop product line.
These figures also excluded the write-off of $8,297,000 associated with McAfee's cash acquisition in March, 1996 of help desk vendor, Vycor Corp.
With these acquisition related charges, earnings before taxes for the first nine months of 1996 were a record $44,634,000, net income was $23,381,000 and earnings per share were $0.44.
Earnings per share figures reflect a three-for-two stock split, effected as a stock dividend, which was distributed on October 17, 1996.
